content: Nice to see a run as we have been lagging for a while. New highs coming soon. The DOJ will drop the aapl charges with Trump in office. The EU will follow or face tariffs they don't want.

author: Wally
content: Bullish: Apple in the sweet spot. US company will benefit under corporate tax cuts. Imports will just be logistically changed from China to India & Indonesia. Foreign based Samsung is in for a lot of hurt.

author: Joe
content: Bearish: Looking at Australian, Germany and French Exchanges today and they're all down - with commentary regarding trump's tariffs. And not one of these Exchanges home Countries are even targeted by these tariffs. Going to get ugly.

author: Get er Done
content: Apple has now grown to about 10% of my portfolio.  I’ve been thinking about selling about 40% to put into some small and mid cap funds.  Buffett liquidated for a reason.  What do you guys think? Is Apple worth the hold or should I diversify some and hold about 60%?
